location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.166 of 1820/21 from John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is related to Residency disbursements. Wedderburn states that Bruce's disbursements for April to June 1820 inclusive, will be transmitted once his department have received receipts for the sum of 6270 rupees, charged in March for His Majesty's mission in Persia.
